title: ContentTypeDescriptor
description: Descriptor for registering a new content type in ContentTypeRegistry

schema_ref.description: Path to type-specific JSON Schema file (relative to schemas/ or absolute URL)

description.description: Human-readable description of this content type

lifecycle_hooks.description: Optional lifecycle hooks (callbacks for content events)

on_register.description: Python module path for on_register hook (e.g., 'agentos.hooks.agent:on_register')

on_activate.description: Python module path for on_activate hook

on_deprecate.description: Python module path for on_deprecate hook

metadata.description: Additional metadata for this content type

is_builtin.description: Whether this is a built-in type (true) or user-registered (false)
